channel.title: PUBLICATIONS on MySite
channel.description: Recent content in PUBLICATIONS on MySite

item.title: 1TON-2024
item.description: [1]. Zhiqing Tang, Fangyi Mou#, Jiong Lou, Weijia Jia, Yuan Wu and Wei Zhao, “Multi-User Layer-Aware Online Container Migration in Edge-Assisted Vehicular Networks,” in IEEE/ACM Transactions on Networking, vol. 32, no. 2, pp. 1807-1822, April 2024. (CCF-A, Co-first author)

item.title: 2MSN-2023
item.description: [2]. Fangyi Mou, Zhiqing Tang, Jiong Lou, Jianxiong Guo, Wenhua Wang and, Tian Wang, “Joint Task Scheduling and Container Image Caching in Edge Computing,” 2023 19th International Conference on Mobility, Sensing and Networking (MSN), Nanjing, China, 2023, pp. 230-237, doi: 10.1109/MSN60784.2023.00044. (CCF-C, Oral presentation)

item.title: 3TMC-2024
item.description: [3]. Zhiqing Tang, Fangyi Mou, Jiong Lou, Weijia Jia, Yuan Wu, and Wei Zhao, “Joint Resource Overbooking and Container Scheduling in Edge Computing,” in IEEE Transactions on Mobile Computing, doi: 10.1109/TMC.2024.3386936. (CCF-A)

item.title: 4TVT-2024
item.description: [4]. Fangyi Mou, Jiong Lou, Zhiqing Tang, Weijia Jia, Yan Zhang, and Wei Zhao. Adaptive Digital Twin Migration in Vehicular Edge Computing and Networks. IEEE Transactions on Vehicular Technology, major revision. (SCI Q1, IF: 6.1)

item.title: 5IEEE-ICMC-2024
item.description: [5]. Mengjie Liu, Yihua Li, Fangyi Mou, Zhiqing Tang, Jiong Lou, Jianxiong Guo, and Weijia Jia, 2024. Low-Latency Layer-Aware Proactive and Passive Container Migration in Meta Computing. 2024 1st IEEE International Conference on Meta Computing (IEEE ICMC), Qingdao, China, 2024.

item.title: 2TSC-2025
item.description: [6]. Fangyi Mou, Zhiqing Tang, and Weijia Jia, “Efficient and Scalable Request Scheduling and Load Balancing for Large Language Model Inference Deployment at the Edge.” (Major revision)

item.title: 7ACMCS-2025
item.description: [7]. Fangyi Mou, Zhiqing Tang, Wu Yuan, Wentao Fan, Weijia Jia and Wei Zhao, “Convergence of Small Language Models and Edge AI Agents for Accelerating Generative AI: A Comprehensive Survey.” (Under review)
